DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test 2 different dose regimen GW433908/ritonavir ( RTV ) versus lopinavir ( LPV ) /RTV give 2 active reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( RTIs ) , patient take anti-HIV drug without success .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Dosing Regimens GW433908/Ritonavir Versus Lopinavir/Ritonavir 48 Weeks HIV Patients Who Have Taken Protease Inhibitors Experienced Virological Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive 2 dose regimen GW433908/RTV LPV/RTV , combination 2 active RTIs , fail first second protease inhibitor-containing regimen . Patients required therapy time screen must remain therapy Day 1 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients may eligible study : Have viral load 1,000 copies/ml . Have take protease inhibitor ( PIs ) . Have take PI drug least 12 straight week virologic failure PIs . Are take antiretroviral therapy . Are male female least 13 year old ( 18 local requirement ) provide consent parent guardian 18 . Are females unable child , able child , pregnant agree use approve birth control . Exclusion Criteria Patients eligible study : Have take APV LPV 1 week . Have take tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( TDF ) adefovir . Have take 2 PIs . Are unable take 2 active RTIs , specify study . Have active CDC Category C disease . Have certain abnormal laboratory test . Are pregnant breastfeeding . Have serious health problem ( e.g. , diabetes , heart problem , hepatitis ) might risk safety patient . Have history significant kidney bone disease . Are able take drug mouth absorb . Have pancreatitis hepatitis within previous 6 month . Have drug allergy allergy might cause problem study . Have radiation chemotherapy within 28 day take study drug , expect need study . Have take drug affect immune system ( corticosteroid , interleukin , interferon ) drug antiHIV activity ( hydroxyurea foscarnet ) within 28 day prior take study drug . Have HIV vaccine within 3 month take study drug . Have take certain drug within 28 day prior take study drug , expect need study . Use alcohol illicit drug way doctor feel would interfere study . Are able take study drug . Have inadequate kidney function .
